title: Move 'Work Order' option under 'Verify Application' section in Work Orders page

requirements.summary: Reorganize the Work Orders page UI to move the 'Work Order' navigation or tab option from the 'Verify' section to appear under the 'Verify Application' section, ensuring clear hierarchy and correct functionality
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Work Order' option is no longer displayed under the 'Verify' section/tab/group.
The 'Work Order' option is now visible and accessible under the 'Verify Application' section/tab/group.
Clicking the 'Work Order' option under 'Verify Application' correctly navigates to or displays the work order content.
All other sections and options remain unaffected.

file_operations.description: Reorganize the tabs, sections, or navigation elements in the WorkOrders page component to move the 'Work Order' option from being grouped under the 'Verify' section to being grouped under the 'Verify Application' section. Update any conditional rendering, tab structures, or navigation logic to reflect this new hierarchy. Ensure that clicking the moved option correctly displays or navigates to the work order content and that all other sections (status updates, accept/decline actions, verification, rating submissions) continue to function correctly.
